short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create complex and secure passwords and copy it to the clipboard with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When registering on websites, it is crucial to use a strong and secure password. It is always recommended to use strong and unique passwords for each site so that if your data is compromised, the rest of your accounts remain safe and your passwords cannot be guessed. This extension generates strong passwords for you and has a convenient UI. You can set the length and type of characters in the settings tab, as well as whether you want to save a record of the last 20 generated passwords.
